homePage.title: A self-custodial bitcoin lightning and liquid wallet.
homePage.subTitle: Your wallet, your coins, 100% open-source

disclaimerPage.switchText1: With Bitcoin, you are your own bank. No one else has access to your private keys.
disclaimerPage.switchText2: If you lose access to this app, and your recovery phrase, your bitcoin cannot be recovered.

securityOptionPage.header: First, Let's create your recovery phrase
securityOptionPage.subHeader: A recovery phrase is a series of 12 words in a specific order. This word combination is unique to your wallet. Make sure to have a pen and paper ready so you can write it down.

generateKeyPage.subHeader: Make sure to write it down exactly as it is shown here.

verifyKeyPage.startHeader: Tap the words in the correct order
verifyKeyPage.incorrectGuess: Sorry, that's not the correct blank word. Try again!
verifyKeyPage.allCorrect: Perfect. Make sure to securely store your recovery phrase.

home.error1: Please enter all of your keys.
home.error2: This is not a valid mnemonic.

loadingScreen.loadingText: We're setting things up. Hang tight!
loadingScreen.errorText1: Error connecting to your node. Try reloading the app.
